00054             function                __construct()
00055             {
00056                   try
00057                   {

00088             function                change_permits_controller( $Options )
00089             {
00090                   try
00091                   {
00092                         $Group = $this->GroupAccess->get_group_by_id( $this->Security->get_p( 'record_id' , 'integer' ) );
00093                         $Permits = $this->Security->get_p( 'permits' , 'command' , array() );
00094                         
00095                         $HasPermits = $this->PermitAlgorithms->get_permits_for_object( $Group->id , 'group' , false );
00096 
00097                         foreach( $HasPermits as $p )
00098                         {
00099                               if( in_array( $p , $Permits ) === false )
00100                               {
00101                                     $p = $this->PermitAccess->get_permit_by_name( $p );
00102                                     $this->Link->delete_link( $Group->id , $p->id , 'group' , 'permit' );
00103                               }
00104                         }
00105 
00106                         foreach( $Permits as $p )
00107                         {
00108                               $this->PermitAccess->add_permit_for_object( $p , $Group->id , 'group' );
00109                         }
00110                   }
00111                   catch( Exception $e )
00112                   {
00113                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00114                   }
00115             }
00116             
00135             function                change_permits_view( $Options )
00136             {
00137                   try
00138                   {
00139                         $Group = $this->GroupAccess->get_group_by_id( $this->Security->get_p( 'group_record_id' , 'integer' ) );
00140                         $this->Output  = '<script src="'.dirname( __FILE__ ).'/include/js/permits.js"></script>';
00141                         $this->Output .= '<center><table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">'.
00142                               '<tr><td>{lang:group_title} : '.$Group->title.'</td></tr><tr><td>{permit_list_widget:'.
00143                               'object={http_param:name=group_record_id;type=integer;post=1};all={permit_list};'.
00144                               'object_permits={permit_list_for_object:type=group;object={http_param:name=group_record_id;'.
00145                               'type=integer;post=1}}}</td></tr></table></center>';
00146                   }
00147                   catch( Exception $e )
00148                   {
00149                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00150                   }
00151             }

00172             {
00173                   try
